fresh Power Purchase Agreement.
However, this matter had been discussed repeatedly as seen in the letters
marked and produced as P52 to P57.

to

the  Power  Purchase

Agreement  with 
the  Petitioner 
and 
to 
forfeit 
the  bond.  The 
said
memorandum is marked and produced as P58(a).

documents marked and produced as P59(a), P59(b), and P59(c).
The  Petitioner  had  sought  to  invoke  the  Writ  Jurisdiction  of  this  court  to
quash the documents marked and produced as P58(c), P59(a), (b) and (c) as

the  said  decisions  are  arbitrary,  unreasonable,  capricious, 
irrational,
